suggestions: Explore additional meal options outside the provided menu to increase calories and protein.
The user should consume a greater variety of foods and look for protein sources with no added carbs.

Fruit contains natural sugars and carbohydrates.  If a small amount of carbohydrates are acceptable, adding fruit would improve both nutrition and satiety.
